content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":250792,"originalJapaneseLine":"悲惨な奴隷観察場に入れられてしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"He is thrown into a miserable slave observation camp."},{"lineNumber":250793,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんとか奴隷観察場から脱出したランスは","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance somehow manages to escape from the slave observation camp."},{"lineNumber":250794,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼスの差別を変えようとするレジスタンス組織に","translatedEnglishLine":"He joins a resistance organization trying to change the discrimination in to,"},{"lineNumber":250803,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス転覆を狙う強行派のペンタゴンが現れ","translatedEnglishLine":"The hardline Pentagon faction aiming to overthrow Zeth appears,"},{"lineNumber":250804,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス国内はテロやクーデターで大混乱","translatedEnglishLine":"Causing great chaos in Zeth with terrorism and down."},{"lineNumber":250806,"originalJapaneseLine":"これは魔物からゼス本国を守っていた防衛壁であった為","translatedEnglishLine":"Since it was a defensive wall protecting the Zeth homeland from up,"},{"lineNumber":250816,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人カミーラを倒し、再可動に成功","translatedEnglishLine":"Defeats the demon Camilla and succeeds in reactivating it."},{"lineNumber":250817,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス本土から魔軍を追い出す事が出来た","translatedEnglishLine":"They were able to drive the demon army out of the Zeth mainland."},{"lineNumber":250818,"originalJapaneseLine":"差別等で揉めていた国内もまとまるきっかけとなった","translatedEnglishLine":"It became a trigger for uniting the country that had been troubled by discrimination and JAPAN."},{"lineNumber":250833,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＪＡＰＡＮは幾多の大名が乱立する戦国時代","translatedEnglishLine":"JAPAN is in the Warring States period, with many feudal lords in conflict."},{"lineNumber":250834,"originalJapaneseLine":"そんな中だが観光旅行","translatedEnglishLine":"Nonetheless, they are on a sightseeing trip."},{"lineNumber":250835,"originalJapaneseLine":"立ち寄った茶屋の主が織田家当主だった","translatedEnglishLine":"The proprietor of the tea house they stopped at was the head of the Oda family."},{"lineNumber":250836,"originalJapaneseLine":"何故かランスとは気が合い、仲良くなる","translatedEnglishLine":"For some reason, he hits it off with Lance and they become friends."},{"lineNumber":250837,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして病弱な彼にかわり織田家を指揮する事となった","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, in place of the frail lord, Lance takes command of the Oda family."},{"lineNumber":250838,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは織田家を率いて","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance leads the Oda family,"},{"lineNumber":250839,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＪＡＰＡＮ全土の制圧に乗り出すのであった","translatedEnglishLine":"And sets out to conquer all of JAPAN."},{"lineNumber":250840,"originalJapaneseLine":"隣国を次々と征服していく…","translatedEnglishLine":"Conquering neighboring countries one after another..."},{"lineNumber":250841,"originalJapaneseLine":"各地の美しい娘はどんどんコマしていく…","translatedEnglishLine":"He steadily takes the beautiful girls from various regions..."},{"lineNumber":250842,"originalJapaneseLine":"美樹、健太郎を保護する…","translatedEnglishLine":"He protects Miki and Kentaro..."},{"lineNumber":250843,"originalJapaneseLine":"連勝を重ね織田家が大国の一角になるが","translatedEnglishLine":"With successive victories, the Oda family becomes a major power,"},{"lineNumber":250844,"originalJapaneseLine":"この勝利は、魔人ザビエルの復活に寄与する事となり","translatedEnglishLine":"But these victories contribute to the revival of the demon Xavier."},{"lineNumber":250845,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人ザビエルが復活する","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon Xavier is resurrected."},{"lineNumber":250846,"originalJapaneseLine":"ザビエルは自分を封印していたＪＡＰＡＮを強く憎んでおり","translatedEnglishLine":"Xavier deeply hates JAPAN, which had sealed him away,"},{"lineNumber":250847,"originalJapaneseLine":"禁妖怪を使いＪＡＰＡＮを消滅させようとする","translatedEnglishLine":"And attempts to annihilate JAPAN using forbidden monsters."},{"lineNumber":250848,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＪＡＰＡＮに危機が迫る","translatedEnglishLine":"JAPAN faces an impending crisis."},{"lineNumber":250849,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは有力武将達と力を合わせて戦う","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance joins forces with powerful generals to fight."},{"lineNumber":250850,"originalJapaneseLine":"そしてなんとか魔人ザビエルを倒した","translatedEnglishLine":"And somehow manages to defeat the demon Xavier."},{"lineNumber":250851,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＪＡＰＡＮは織田家の元で統一された","translatedEnglishLine":"JAPAN was unified under the Oda family."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悲惨な奴隷観察場に入れられてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is thrown into a miserable slave observation camp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとか奴隷観察場から脱出したランスは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance somehow manages to escape from the slave observation camp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスの差別を変えようとするレジスタンス組織に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He joins a resistance organization trying to change the discrimination in Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 参加する事になった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He decided to participate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: グリーン隊を率いてレジスタンス作戦実施…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leading the Green Squad, he carries out resistance operations...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殺人鬼サーベルナイトを成敗…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He defeats the murderous Saber Knight...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪い銀行に侵入し銀行強盗…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He breaks into a bad bank and commits a bank robbery...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法博物館で魔法具を盗む…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He steals magical items from the magic museum...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪い刑務所に侵入して所長を倒す…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He infiltrates a corrupt prison and defeats the warden...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 迫害され絶滅しそうなムシ使いを助ける…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He helps an insect tamer who is being persecuted and facing extinction...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが所属する穏健派のレジスタンスとは違い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unlike the moderate resistance group Lance belongs to,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス転覆を狙う強行派のペンタゴンが現れ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The hardline Pentagon faction aiming to overthrow Zeth appears,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス国内はテロやクーデターで大混乱
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Causing great chaos in Zeth with terrorism and coups.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスも参加した作戦でマジノラインが停止
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In an operation Lance also participated in, the Maginot Line was shut down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは魔物からゼス本国を守っていた防衛壁であった為
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since it was a defensive wall protecting the Zeth homeland from monsters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大量の魔物魔軍が侵入しゼスは滅亡の危機に陥る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A large monster army invaded, putting Zeth at the brink of destruction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうゼス国内で人間同士が争っている場合ではない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is no longer time for humans to fight among themselves in Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 力を合わせて魔物と戦わねばいけない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They must join forces and fight the monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスを中心に反撃作戦を開始する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Starting a counterattack operation centered on Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大量の難民を安全な地域まで移動させる…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Moving large numbers of refugees to safe areas...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人サイゼル、ジークを倒す…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeating the demons Saizel and Sieg...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 廃棄されそうになっていたカオスを取り戻す…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Recovering Chaos, who was about to be discarded...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最期はマジノラインを再可動させる為に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the end, to reactivate the Maginot Line,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の立て籠もる要塞に侵入し
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He invades the fortress where the demon army is holed up,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人カミーラを倒し、再可動に成功
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeats the demon Camilla and succeeds in reactivating it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス本土から魔軍を追い出す事が出来た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were able to drive the demon army out of the Zeth mainland.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 差別等で揉めていた国内もまとまるきっかけとなった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It became a trigger for uniting the country that had been troubled by discrimination and such.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: めでたし、めでたし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And they lived happily ever after.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はにほー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haniho~ (a cheerful greeting or sign-off)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後々、関係してくる設定ポイントをまとめるよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll summarize the setting points that will be relevant later.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスを救い王女マジックの婚約者となる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He saved Zeth and became the fiancé of Princess Magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３体の魔人を倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeats three demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランスというランスの子供が現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A child of Lance called Dark Lance appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人カミーラを永久牢に捉えた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Imprisoned the demon Camilla in a permanent cell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザ、自信を取り戻す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Urza regained his confidence.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パットン、一緒に行動する間柄となる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Patton becomes an ally who acts together with him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦国ランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sengoku Rance (Warring States Lance)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２００６年発売
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Released in 2006.
800x600, Windows only.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスとシィルはＪＡＰＡＮに来た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and Syl come to JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮは幾多の大名が乱立する戦国時代
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: JAPAN is in the Warring States period, with many feudal lords in conflict.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな中だが観光旅行
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nonetheless, they are on a sightseeing trip.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 立ち寄った茶屋の主が織田家当主だった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The proprietor of the tea house they stopped at was the head of the Oda family.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何故かランスとは気が合い、仲良くなる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For some reason, he hits it off with Lance and they become friends.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして病弱な彼にかわり織田家を指揮する事となった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, in place of the frail lord, Lance takes command of the Oda family.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは織田家を率いて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance leads the Oda family,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮ全土の制圧に乗り出すのであった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And sets out to conquer all of JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 隣国を次々と征服していく…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conquering neighboring countries one after another...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各地の美しい娘はどんどんコマしていく…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He steadily takes the beautiful girls from various regions...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹、健太郎を保護する…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He protects Miki and Kentaro...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 連勝を重ね織田家が大国の一角になるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With successive victories, the Oda family becomes a major power,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この勝利は、魔人ザビエルの復活に寄与する事となり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But these victories contribute to the revival of the demon Xavier.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ザビエルが復活する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Xavier is resurrected.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザビエルは自分を封印していたＪＡＰＡＮを強く憎んでおり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Xavier deeply hates JAPAN, which had sealed him away,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 禁妖怪を使いＪＡＰＡＮを消滅させようとする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And attempts to annihilate JAPAN using forbidden monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮに危機が迫る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: JAPAN faces an impending crisis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは有力武将達と力を合わせて戦う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance joins forces with powerful generals to fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてなんとか魔人ザビエルを倒した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And somehow manages to defeat the demon Xavier.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮは織田家の元で統一された
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: JAPAN was unified under the Oda family.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悲惨な奴隷観察場に入れられてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is thrown into a miserable slave observation camp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとか奴隷観察場から脱出したランスは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance somehow manages to escape from the slave observation camp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスの差別を変えようとするレジスタンス組織に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He joins a resistance organization trying to change the discrimination in Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 参加する事になった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He decided to participate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: グリーン隊を率いてレジスタンス作戦実施…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leading the Green Squad, he carries out resistance operations...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殺人鬼サーベルナイトを成敗…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He defeats the murderous Saber Knight...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪い銀行に侵入し銀行強盗…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He breaks into a bad bank and commits a bank robbery...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法博物館で魔法具を盗む…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He steals magical items from the magic museum...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪い刑務所に侵入して所長を倒す…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He infiltrates a corrupt prison and defeats the warden...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 迫害され絶滅しそうなムシ使いを助ける…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He helps an insect tamer who is being persecuted and facing extinction...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが所属する穏健派のレジスタンスとは違い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unlike the moderate resistance group Lance belongs to,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス転覆を狙う強行派のペンタゴンが現れ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The hardline Pentagon faction aiming to overthrow Zeth appears,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス国内はテロやクーデターで大混乱
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Causing great chaos in Zeth with terrorism and coups.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスも参加した作戦でマジノラインが停止
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In an operation Lance also participated in, the Maginot Line was shut down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは魔物からゼス本国を守っていた防衛壁であった為
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since it was a defensive wall protecting the Zeth homeland from monsters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大量の魔物魔軍が侵入しゼスは滅亡の危機に陥る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A large monster army invaded, putting Zeth at the brink of destruction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうゼス国内で人間同士が争っている場合ではない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is no longer time for humans to fight among themselves in Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 力を合わせて魔物と戦わねばいけない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They must join forces and fight the monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスを中心に反撃作戦を開始する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Starting a counterattack operation centered on Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大量の難民を安全な地域まで移動させる…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Moving large numbers of refugees to safe areas...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人サイゼル、ジークを倒す…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeating the demons Saizel and Sieg...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 廃棄されそうになっていたカオスを取り戻す…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Recovering Chaos, who was about to be discarded...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最期はマジノラインを再可動させる為に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the end, to reactivate the Maginot Line,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の立て籠もる要塞に侵入し
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He invades the fortress where the demon army is holed up,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人カミーラを倒し、再可動に成功
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeats the demon Camilla and succeeds in reactivating it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス本土から魔軍を追い出す事が出来た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were able to drive the demon army out of the Zeth mainland.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 差別等で揉めていた国内もまとまるきっかけとなった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It became a trigger for uniting the country that had been troubled by discrimination and such.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: めでたし、めでたし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And they lived happily ever after.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はにほー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haniho~ (a cheerful greeting or sign-off)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後々、関係してくる設定ポイントをまとめるよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll summarize the setting points that will be relevant later.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスを救い王女マジックの婚約者となる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He saved Zeth and became the fiancé of Princess Magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３体の魔人を倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeats three demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランスというランスの子供が現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A child of Lance called Dark Lance appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人カミーラを永久牢に捉えた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Imprisoned the demon Camilla in a permanent cell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザ、自信を取り戻す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Urza regained his confidence.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パットン、一緒に行動する間柄となる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Patton becomes an ally who acts together with him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦国ランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sengoku Rance (Warring States Lance)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２００６年発売
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Released in 2006.
800x600, Windows only.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスとシィルはＪＡＰＡＮに来た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and Syl come to JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮは幾多の大名が乱立する戦国時代
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: JAPAN is in the Warring States period, with many feudal lords in conflict.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな中だが観光旅行
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nonetheless, they are on a sightseeing trip.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 立ち寄った茶屋の主が織田家当主だった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The proprietor of the tea house they stopped at was the head of the Oda family.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何故かランスとは気が合い、仲良くなる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For some reason, he hits it off with Lance and they become friends.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして病弱な彼にかわり織田家を指揮する事となった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, in place of the frail lord, Lance takes command of the Oda family.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは織田家を率いて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance leads the Oda family,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮ全土の制圧に乗り出すのであった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And sets out to conquer all of JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 隣国を次々と征服していく…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conquering neighboring countries one after another...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各地の美しい娘はどんどんコマしていく…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He steadily takes the beautiful girls from various regions...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹、健太郎を保護する…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He protects Miki and Kentaro...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 連勝を重ね織田家が大国の一角になるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With successive victories, the Oda family becomes a major power,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この勝利は、魔人ザビエルの復活に寄与する事となり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But these victories contribute to the revival of the demon Xavier.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ザビエルが復活する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Xavier is resurrected.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザビエルは自分を封印していたＪＡＰＡＮを強く憎んでおり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Xavier deeply hates JAPAN, which had sealed him away,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 禁妖怪を使いＪＡＰＡＮを消滅させようとする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And attempts to annihilate JAPAN using forbidden monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮに危機が迫る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: JAPAN faces an impending crisis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは有力武将達と力を合わせて戦う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance joins forces with powerful generals to fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてなんとか魔人ザビエルを倒した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And somehow manages to defeat the demon Xavier.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮは織田家の元で統一された
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: JAPAN was unified under the Oda family.
